item.title: The Week Ahead: Jan. 27-31, 2025 | Washington State House Republicans
item.description: News article "The Week Ahead: Jan. 27-31, 2025 | Washington State House Republicans" from House Republicans.

item.title: 👍💵Jay Balasbas - PacifiCorp
item.description: Jay Balasbas signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent PacifiCorp. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍Jillian Caires - Avista Corporation
item.description: Jillian Caires signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Avista Corporation.

item.title: 👍💵Matt Miller - Puget Sound Energy
item.description: Matt Miller signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Puget Sound Energy. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👎Alessandra De la Torre - NW Energy Coalition
item.description: Alessandra De la Torre signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent NW Energy Coalition.

item.title: 👍💵Peter Godlewski - Association of Washington Business
item.description: Peter Godlewski signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Association of Washington Business. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: ❓💵Scott Hazlegrove - Weyerhaeuser
item.description: Scott Hazlegrove signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent Weyerhaeuser. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍💵Brandon Houskeeper - Alliance of Western Energy Consumers
item.description: Brandon Houskeeper signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Alliance of Western Energy Consumers. They are a registered lobbyist.
